Episodes.Title: Prisoner of the Judoon (1)
Episodes.Plot: Sarah Jane and the gang face the most dangerous day of their lives, as the rhino-like Judoon return. When prisoner Androvax the Destroyer crash-lands on Earth, a Veil is set free and starts to turn Earth's technology against itself.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul Kasey, Nicholas Briggs, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti, Terence Maynard, Robert Curtis, Mark Goldthorp, Scarlett Murphy

Episodes.Title: Prisoner of the Judoon (2)
Episodes.Plot: Luke, Clyde and Rani must fight their most fearsome enemy yet - Sarah Jane Smith.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul Kasey, Nicholas Briggs, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti, Terence Maynard, Robert Curtis, Mark Goldthorp, Scarlett Murphy

Episodes.Title: The Mad Woman in the Attic (1)
Episodes.Plot: Far in the future, in the year 2059, Old Rani remembers the day when her whole life went wrong.
Episodes.GuestStars: Eleanor Tomlinson, Toby Parkes, Souad Faress, Gregg Sulkin, Kate Fleetwood

Episodes.Title: The Mad Woman in the Attic (2)
Episodes.Plot: Eve's powers grow out of control, catching everyone in her endless sinister games.
Episodes.GuestStars: Eleanor Tomlinson, Toby Parkes, Souad Faress, Gregg Sulkin, Kate Fleetwood

Episodes.Title: The Wedding of Sarah Jane Smith (1)
Episodes.Plot: The Doctor returns on the happiest day of Sarah Jane's life, but a deadly trap is waiting for them all.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Tennant, Brian Miller, Nigel Havers, Paul Marc Davis, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti, Zienia Merton

Episodes.Title: The Wedding of Sarah Jane Smith (2)
Episodes.Plot: The Doctor arrives to join the battle, but is he too late to save both Sarah Jane and the Earth itself?
Episodes.GuestStars: David Tennant, Brian Miller, Nigel Havers, Paul Marc Davis, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti, Zienia Merton

Episodes.Title: The Eternity Trap (1)
Episodes.Plot: A haunted house, with mysterious whispers and secrets in the shadows - time for Sarah Jane Smith!
Episodes.GuestStars: Floella Benjamin, Donald Sumpter, Callum Blue, Adam Gillen, Amelia Clarkson, Rhys Gear, Tony Boncza

Episodes.Title: The Eternity Trap (2)
Episodes.Plot: Sarah Jane and the gang discover the secret of Erasmus Darkening - but are they too late?
Episodes.GuestStars: Floella Benjamin, Donald Sumpter, Callum Blue, Adam Gillen, Amelia Clarkson, Rhys Gear, Tony Boncza

Episodes.Title: Mona Lisa's Revenge (1)
Episodes.Plot: Unknown forces bring to life Leonardo Da Vinci's most famous painting, and Clyde's day becomes a nightmare when a school trip descends into disaster. Trapped and without Sarah Jane's help the gang must find a way to battle the awesome abomination.
Episodes.GuestStars: Suranne Jones, Jeff Rawle, Lizo Mzimba, Liza Sadovy, Paul Kasey, Ace Bhatti

Episodes.Title: Mona Lisa's Revenge (2)
Episodes.Plot: As Luke and Rani investigate the myth of the dreaded abomination, Mona Lisa vows to free her horrifying brother from his prison, but everything now depends upon Clyde to stop the terror.
Episodes.GuestStars: Suranne Jones, Jeff Rawle, Lizo Mzimba, Liza Sadovy, Paul Kasey, Ace Bhatti

Episodes.Title: The Gift (1)
Episodes.Plot: The Blathereen, arch-rivals of the family Slitheen arrive on Earth. In a move that surprises the gang they declare peace between Earth and Raxicoricofallapatorius and they offer Sarah Jane a gift, one that might change the future of the human race forever.
Episodes.GuestStars: Calvin Dean, Simon Callow, Miriam Margolyes, Paul Kasey, Ruari Mears, Jimmy Vee, Edward Judge, Sarah Paul, Nick Williams

Episodes.Title: The Gift (2)
Episodes.Plot: Sarah Jane faces the battle of her life to save her son from the effects of the gift of the Blathereen. Meanwhile trapped in the school, Rani, Clyde and K-9 fight to find a way to get to the attic, where the final showdown will take place.
Episodes.GuestStars: Calvin Dean, Simon Callow, Miriam Margolyes, Paul Kasey, Ruari Mears, Jimmy Vee, Edward Judge, Sarah Paul, Nick Williams
